title: WCAS POLI_SCI 490-0-22 Special Topics in Political Science

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Conceptualizing Culture, Prof. Loubna El Amine Winter 2017
The central question that this course addresses is whether culture is a useful concept, particularly for the study of non-Western societies. The focus will be on the political theory literature, including debates around comparative political theory, multiculturalism, and global justice. But the readings will also draw from the broader political science literature, including the world values survey and ethnographic approaches to culture.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: No books will be assigned, just articles and excerpts
